name: Amazement Attendant Comica
effectText: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Set 1 "Attraction" Trap directly from your Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your "Attraction" Traps equipped to a monster; equip it to 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Amazement Attendant Comica" once per turn.
